my favorite coffee is french vanilla.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1! I'm a veterinary technician.
Hi participant_2! I'm participant_2! I love animals, so that's a pretty cool job!
Thanks! It is, I get to work with them every day and help them feel better.
That's so great! I have a dog, he's a pug and he's the best pet I could ask for.
Pugs are so cute! I love their big heads and short legs.
He's the most loyal dog I've ever met. He follows me everywhere I go.
That's so sweet! I love dogs that are affectionate.
He's my best friend, I'm so glad I have him.
I'm sure he's glad to have you too!
Me too!
So, what do you do for fun?
I enjoy beading and writing my own patterns.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to bead.
It's really easy to get started! There are lots of tutorials online.
Maybe I'll check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can make really beautiful things.
I think I will!
Great! I can't wait to see what you make.
Thanks! I'll let you know when I finish something.
Awesome
